AssociateCoupon.name: AssociateCoupon
AssociateCoupon.description:
Associates a DeepComposer coupon (or DSN) with the account associated with the sender
                                                of the request.

CreateAudio.name: CreateAudio
CreateAudio.description: Creates an audio file by converting the midi composition into a wav or mp3 file.

CreateModel.name: CreateModel
CreateModel.description:
Starts creating/training a generative-model that is able to perform inference against
                                                the user-provided piano-melody to create a multi-track midi composition.

GetSampleModel.name: GetSampleModel
GetSampleModel.description: Returns information about the sample/pre-trained DeepComposer model.

ListCompositions.name: ListCompositions
ListCompositions.description: Returns a list of all the compositions owned by the sender of the request.

ListModels.name: ListModels
ListModels.description: Returns a list of all the models owned by the sender of the request.

ListSampleModels.name: ListSampleModels
ListSampleModels.description: Returns a list of all the sample/pre-trained models provided by the DeepComposer service.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tag for a resource.

ListTrainingTopics.name: ListTrainingTopics
ListTrainingTopics.description: Returns a list of all the training options or topic for creating/training a model.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource.

UpdateComposition.name: UpdateComposition
UpdateComposition.description: Modifies the mutable properties associated with a composition.

UpdateModel.name: UpdateModel
UpdateModel.description: Modifies the mutable properties associated with a model.
